author: Constantino (Constante) Ribalaigua Vert
description: A classic Daiquiri with aged rum and a hint of chocolate.
name: Mulata Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur
7.5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
